name: Sendemailwebapp
tagline: Webapp with formulary to send email a specified destinatary.
body:
#SendEmailWebapp project.
## Welcome to SendEmailWebApp project.
This project is a web application that sends an mail to specified user.
We developed it for put it in a "iframe" tag on other pages or CMS.

## Examples
[Retele Contact Section](http://retele.linkeddata.es/web/guest/contact)

## Guides:
[Installation Guide](https://github.com/oeg-upm/SendEmailWebApp/blob/master/README.md)
[Development Guide](https://github.com/oeg-upm/SendEmailWebApp/wiki/Development-Guide)

## Authors and Contributors
[@Fransiro](https://github.com/Fransiro/)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Develop it or Install it? Send email to: [ocorcho@fi.upm.es](mailto:ocorcho@fi.upm.es)
